desc: Aquahealclub is the sustainable personalized hydration multiplier. Our drinkable mineral mix provides you with all important electrolytes like magnesium, sodium, potassium chloride and calcium. Helps with heartburn, acid reflux, high blood pressure, diabetes type 2 and other symptoms. Keto friendly.Vegan.Sugar-free.

layout.text: NO FLAVORS. NO SUGAR. NO BUZZWORDS.
Turn your tap water into personalized healing water
Introducing science-backed, healthy and sustainable daily hydration.
